Class Table

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Table
extends java.awt.geom.RoundRectangle2D.Float
    Class to represent the air hockey table.
    Author:
    Joshua Segeren

      • getGoalWidth

        public float getGoalWidth()

      • getCollisionFrame

        public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getCollisionFrame(float collisionRadius)
        Returns the frame, modified to account for radius of round colliding objects. This is the effective collision bounding box of the table; we simply reduce all the dimensions by the given radius.
        Parameters:
        collisionRadius - radius of colliding object
        Returns:
        Rectangle2D collision frame

      • getRobotWorkspaceCollisionFrame
